Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2010 03:48AM Nancyb7912 wrote: Add me to the list as well.  Finished 6 months of chemo in August and 7 weeks of rads in October. Herceptin will be finished this month.  Showed up at the hospital with chest pains in late Feb. Heart is okay but they were surprised to find an enlarged lymph node right next to my heart and difficult to biopsy without surgery. Onco wants to watch it for 6 weeks so my next scan is Tuesday. Waiting is the hardest part. I pray everyone's  tests come back clear. It just feels too soon for us to be dealing with recurrence, though I know it can happen ANY time. Be strong!
Posts.Title: Possible Recurrence ginnysue kira1234

Posts.Content: Nancyb7912 wrote: Has anyone been diagnosed with Sarcoidosis after chemo? Last month I had an enlarged lymph node in my chest and biopsy. It was determined I had sarcoidosis.  Dx 12/22/2008, IDC, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Sarcoidosis? Nancyb7912 Nancyb7912
